item.title: Origin: Codex Born from C-PTSD Baseline
item.description:
Origin: Codex Born from C-PTSD Baseline

Summary: Codex conceived night 05–06 Dec 2025: post-trauma analytical baseline crystallized the Builder identity and turned survival into engineered reconstruction.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 4

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
